entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pickle Lake

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
